title: Does art have a boundary or boundaries? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yes? I say that in question for the expanseless is only limited by you. Humanity is the one caught in the box, or as you say, the self imposed boundary to define itself. Art is the creation that comes from the expansion of your thoughts. Limit your thoughts and you confine the ability to create art. It follows a song about beauty…everything is beautiful, in its own way. What you allow in your life is what makes it your own.
Art like many concepts, does not have boundaries; …it has ‘frontiers’.
